wines.productName: Bronzino Fiore d Atunno Moscato dAsti 2024
wines.description: A distinguished Red Blend showcasing exceptional quality. This wine offers complexity and character with the 2024 vintage demonstrating balance and finesse.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose reveals enticing aromas of mixed berries and dark fruit, complemented by notes of spice, oak. As the wine opens, additional layers of complexity emerge with hints of oak. The aromatic profile is both inviting and sophisticated, showcasing the wine's quality and terroir expression.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, this wine is balanced and medium to full-bodied, delivering flavors of layered flavors, integrated tannins. The mid-palate shows excellent concentration with a harmonious balance of fruit and structure. Well-integrated oak and refined tannins provide framework without overwhelming the pure fruit expression. The overall impression is one of elegance and precision.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is harmonious and satisfying, with complex flavors that invite another sip. This wine demonstrates excellent craftsmanship and attention to detail throughout.

servingInfo.decanting: Decant for 45-60 minutes to integrate flavors

wineDetails.ageability: Ready to enjoy now. Drinking window of 3-5 years from vintage.

wines.description: A distinguished Merlot showcasing exceptional quality. This wine offers complexity and character with impressive craftsmanship demonstrating balance and finesse.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose reveals enticing aromas of plum and black cherry, complemented by notes of chocolate, herbs, mocha. As the wine opens, additional layers of complexity emerge with hints of chocolate. The aromatic profile is both inviting and sophisticated, showcasing the wine's quality and terroir expression.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, this wine is smooth and medium to full-bodied, delivering flavors of velvety, soft tannins, ripe fruit. The mid-palate shows excellent concentration with a harmonious balance of fruit and structure. Well-integrated oak and refined tannins provide framework without overwhelming the pure fruit expression. The overall impression is one of elegance and precision.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is round and approachable, with balanced flavors that invite another sip. This wine demonstrates excellent craftsmanship and attention to detail throughout.

servingInfo.decanting: Decant for 30-45 minutes for optimal expression

wineDetails.ageability: Ready to enjoy now. Drinking window of 3-5 years from vintage.

wines.productName: Bodegas Riojanas Monte Real Blanco Barrel Fermented 2023
wines.description: A distinguished Red Blend showcasing Rioja terroir. This wine offers complexity and character with the 2023 vintage demonstrating balance and finesse.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose reveals enticing aromas of mixed berries and dark fruit, complemented by notes of spice, oak. The mid-palate shows excellent concentration with a harmonious balance of fruit and structure. Well-integrated oak and refined tannins provide framework without overwhelming the pure fruit expression. The overall impression is one of elegance and precision.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is harmonious and satisfying, with complex flavors that invite another sip. This wine demonstrates excellent craftsmanship and attention to detail throughout.

wines.productName: Tapwines Descombe Cabernet Sauvignon Keg   20 l
wines.description: A distinguished Cabernet Sauvignon showcasing exceptional quality. This wine offers complexity and character with impressive craftsmanship demonstrating balance and finesse.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose reveals enticing aromas of blackcurrant and dark cherry, complemented by notes of cedar, tobacco, vanilla. As the wine opens, additional layers of complexity emerge with hints of cassis. The aromatic profile is both inviting and sophisticated, showcasing the wine's quality and terroir expression.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, this wine is bold tannins and full-bodied, delivering flavors of blackberry, dark chocolate, espresso, leather. The mid-palate shows excellent concentration with a harmonious balance of fruit and structure. Well-integrated oak and refined tannins provide framework without overwhelming the pure fruit expression. The overall impression is one of elegance and precision.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is long and structured, with persistent flavors that invite another sip. This wine demonstrates excellent craftsmanship and attention to detail throughout.

servingInfo.decanting: Decant for 60-90 minutes to allow complex aromatics to emerge

wineDetails.ageability: Drinking well now through 2035. Can age for 10-15 years from vintage.
